name: Haritha Kakatiya Hotel
description:
Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Warangal, Haritha Kakatiya Hotel is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its family-friendly environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Haritha Kakatiya Hotel makes it easy to enjoy the best of Warangal.
You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer air conditioning, bringing comfort and convenience to your visit.
The small hotel features room service. Plus, Haritha Kakatiya Hotel offers an on-site restaurant, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.
Nearby landmarks such as Thousand Pillar Temple (1.3 mi) and ISKCON Warangal Temple (2.3 mi) make Haritha Kakatiya Hotel a great place to stay when visiting Warangal.
While staying in Warangal, you can check out a popular diner like Laxmi Lagoons Kitchen, which is serving up some great dishes.
Best of all, Haritha Kakatiya Hotel makes it easy to experience some great Warangal attractions like Warangal Fort, which is a popular historic site.
Haritha Kakatiya Hotel is sure to make your visit to Warangal one worth remembering.

name: Hotel Shreya
description:
See why so many travelers make Hotel Shreya their small hotel of choice when visiting Warangal. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.
ISKCON Warangal Temple (1.5 mi), located nearby, makes Hotel Shreya a great place to stay for those interested in visiting this popular Warangal landmark.
Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar.
While in Warangal be sure to experience nearby Asian restaurants such as Manu Restaurant or Laxmi Lagoons Kitchen.
Warangal is also home to Warangal Fort, a popular historic site that is not too far from Hotel Shreya.
At Hotel Shreya, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Warangal.
